title: 103_hr1107
content: Wind Engineering Research Program Act of 1993 - Establishes within the National Institute of Standards and Technology (Institute) a Wind Engineering Program which shall: (1) provide for wind engineering research, (2) serve as an information clearinghouse. And (3) improve interagency coordination on wind engineering research. Requires the Director of the Institute to establish: (1) a Wind Engineering Research Advisory Committee, and (2) a national wind engineering research and development plan.
